participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Reserved and thoughtful, Alex tends to be quiet but has a deep interest in stories and characters.
participant_1.background: I was diagnosed with autism. I listen to Linkin Park, I do not know why. People in school said I was quiet. I have not done anything since high school.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, Emma loves to engage in discussions and has a great love for storytelling.
participant_2.background: I am really excited to see how Game of Thrones ends. I like to do all my shopping at Walmart. I am deathly terrified of heights. Winter's my favorite time of the year.

content.text: I'm really excited for Game of Thrones to come back. I've been watching it since it started.
Me too! I'm really curious to see how it all ends.
I'm a little nervous, because I don't want it to end.
I know what you mean. I'm going to miss it when it's over.
Me too. What's your favorite part of the show?
I like the political intrigue. It's so interesting to see how the characters interact with each other.
Me too. I also like the fantasy elements.
They are! I'm also a big fan of the White Walkers.
I'm really curious to see what happens to them.
Me too. I'm sure it'll be something epic.
I can't wait to see how it all ends!
